item.description: About Elastic Load Balancing (ELB) automa足tically distri足butes incoming applic足ation traffic across multiple targets, such as EC2’s, contai足ners, IP addresses, & Lambda functions. Elastic Load Balancing is a best practice to assign incoming traffic to a single target, such as an EC2 Instance, and then distribute the rest of the traffic across the target’s resources. An elastic load balancer distributes traffic across an arbitrary number of targets.
